test.create_query: CREATE TABLE join_dictionary_source_table (key UInt64, value String) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY key;
CREATE DICTIONARY join_hashed_dictionary (key UInt64, value String) PRIMARY KEY key SOURCE(CLICKHOUSE(DB 'default' TABLE 'join_dictionary_source_table')) LIFETIME(MIN 0 MAX 1000) LAYOUT(HASHED());
test.query: SELECT COUNT() FROM join_dictionary_source_table JOIN join_hashed_dictionary ON join_dictionary_source_table.key = join_hashed_dictionary.key;
SELECT COUNT() FROM join_dictionary_source_table JOIN join_hashed_dictionary ON join_dictionary_source_table.key = toUInt64(join_hashed_dictionary.key);
